title: FS: 1910 T212 Obak Hank Perry with Two Ghost Images
author: Orioles1954

posts.post_title: FS: 1910 T212 Obak Hank Perry with Two Ghost Images
posts.post_content:
1910 T212 Obak Perry with two ghost images! First is himself then there is another guy, who I indentified as LaLonge. Price is $160 dlvd. for this neat card. [url]james.f.feagin@gmail.com[/url]

[img]http://march10.hugginsandscott.com/f10/19047_obak_ghost_image.jpg[/img][img]http://march10.hugginsandscott.com/f10/19047a_obak_ghost_image.jpg[/img]

Wow not into the obaks anymore but had to comment.. thats a neat one, you have a unique freak there.. :eek: i was expecting to see some BS back print on the front from bein sandwiched under another card in a hot attic for years that some guys are callin "ghosts" these days..  but that there is a true dbl strike ghost with almost a full image, pretty cool there was enuff of lalonge to identify him too.. if it was a 206 i'd take him off your hands. best of luck !
